name: Defender of Stocks
description:
Defender of Stocks takes place in a rundown office building that has been taken over by corrupted money bags. You play as an average stock trader who has found himself alone in the fight for the stock market. Will you defeat these evil monsters and save the stock market, or will you live to see it fall? 

Hey! Thanks for taking a look at my first fully finished and published game. I am super excited to publish my first finished game, and I hope that everyone can enjoy it! Also, this game was made in about a week for the Beginner's Circle Game Jam of 2020 (Thank you to the organizers for making all of this possible!). Finally, I greatly appreciate any helpful game development/programming/art tips within the comments, as I eagerly look forward to getting better and better at making games.

Once again, thank you!
